div.pre: 2178 Selinunte, 1876 (946) Burial: early 3rd cent. B.C. (K) Contents: 300 AR. From excavations in same house as no. 2247 below Syracuse: 1 tetradr. (Agathocles, quadr. type) Siculo-Punic: 28 tetradr. (Arethusa/horse hd. [21]; Heracles/horse hd. [7]) 1 "didr." (? = Jenkins- Lewis, pl. 26, 14 ff.) Rash Melcarth: 1 tetradr. Disposition: Palermo 31 (as above) NSc 1877, pp. 20, 72 (not seen by K) Tusa Cutroni, AIIN 1956, p. 209; Kokalos 1961, pp. 152-3, illus.
